newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek bourse ends year on firm tone, volume up.
newsitem.headline: Greek bourse ends year on firm tone, volume up.

text.p: The Athens bourse ended firm on Tuesday after active block trading with the benchmark share index ending the year at 933.48 for gains of 0.43 percent.
Trading volume rose to 7.8 billion drachmas on volume of 3.9 million shares in active block trading.
Gainers led losers 143 to 60 with 27 issues unchanged on 239 traded.
Banks rose 0.34 percent, construction gained 1.07 percent while small caps ended 1.80 percent higher. Industrials closed 0.28 percent firmer.
